text: Bronisław Chromy (June 3, 1925 – October 4, 2017) was a Polish sculptor, painter, and a professor at the Academy of Fine Arts in Cracow. Chromy was a member of the Polish Academy of Learning. He was born at Leńcze near Lanckorona. Chromy died in Kraków, Poland on October 4, 2017 at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:Living people Category:Polish painters Category:Polish sculptors Category:Polish academics
title: Bronisław Chromy
